feed.title: Koel Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(editing songs): track number removed when editing multiple songs by @ShetlandJ in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1842
  • chore(config): update comment for Spotify integration by @ziko1153 in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1867
  • feat: use PHP attribute to mark requests disabled in demo by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1873
  • build(deps): bump symfony/http-foundation from 6.4.4 to 6.4.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1872
  • build(deps): bump symfony/process from 6.4.4 to 6.4.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1871
  • refactor: avoid leadking database keys by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1874
  • fix:koel:doctor – check DB connection before media storage by @phanan in d2606414b7ea29f4fd7eace20dc1269717e6546a
  • chore: koel:doctor – check if storage type is local or S3lamda before checking for Koel Plus license by @phanan in 47173d92e49f5d5b6fdf463863b89d75ff65b3cb
  • fix: (Koel Plus) shared playlists not showing at root level by @phanan in e85c42eb32b4425c9b6b90ecdda0e80ed600f0cc
  • fix: one playlist can be added into multiple folders by @phanan in 95ceb1bb11991c8debeb69f032ca11c1b6ab1dae
  • fix: wrong cache key normalization by @phanan in 1e1fed5fdad860afb19247c2d00c1a28fd28677a

New Contributors

  • @ziko1153 made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1867

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.2.0...v7.2.1

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: group by issue in Postgres (closes #1907) by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1908
  • fix: various broken tests by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1909
  • feat: add Butterchurn visualizer by @kran27 in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1892

New Contributors

  • @kran27 made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1892

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.2.1...v7.2.2

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: broken koel:doctor command for Docker builds
  • docs: add Koel Plus license documentation and troubleshooting tips
  • feat: add Mono theme
  • feat: support AIFF

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.2.2...v7.3.0

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: strong types and more tests for StreamerAdapter by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1918
  • feat: sorting albums by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1920
  • feat: set album release year during scan by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1921
  • feat: show album release year if applicable by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1922
  • feat: add album Date Added sort by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1923
  • feat: add Artist sort by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1924
  • fix: prevent stray headers from being sent when using X-Accel and X-Sendfile adapters

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.3.1...v7.4.0
